title: When will BigHit have an audition for girls? - Quora

response.answer_text: Definitely not anytime soon (like for around 7–10 years? Or never). BigHit used to have a girl group named Glam nearly a decade ago that disbanded due to a bunch of scandals. They probably don’t want to deal with that again. Girl groups are also generally not as popular as boy groups, mostly because the majority of the K-pop fanbase are girls. From what I see, BigHit seems to have a special formula for the boy groups that allows them to be more successful. Girl groups also tend to get more hate than boy groups about their image, so I feel like Bighit doesn’t want to deal with that. (Idk, that might just be me though.) Lastly (I personally think this is the biggest reason), BigHit doesn’t want to deal with the fangirls. Think about it, if you want to try out, are you doing it because you want to dance for 8+ hours per day, sing until your voice breaks, and diet until you are skinny as a stick, or do you just want to be acquainted with BTS? Idk about you, but I’d go with the second option. However, BigHit want actual talent and pure determination, not desperate saesang girls who want to “be near their oppas” and get attention. While I’m sure there are plenty of girls who actually want to work hard and become an idol and don’t care too much about BTS, it’s just too risky. Dang it, BigHit is smart. There goes all my plans.

They probably won’t. Like ever. The head honchos at big hit have said they are not interested in females trainees at the moment. If they ever decide to have a girl group in the future, they will more than likely borrow or outsource from other companies. From what I understand, they’ve been training boy groups for the past 5 or so years solely, so they probably wouldn’t even have the accommodations for girl groups. I doubt they would be mixing girls into their boy dorms. If they ever have an audition I’m sure they’d be making it public to let everyone know. But I don’t think bighit will be taking female trainees anytime soon.

Probably never. Bang Si Hyuk has a formula that works for males. Girl groups are a totally different animal, have a shorter shelf life. They bring in less revenue, they get married and they get pregnant. Female idols use their position in a group to jockey for acting gigs and again Bang Si Hyuk has the philosophy *group first* He's not going to change his game plan anytime soon.

They did, back in October for a girl group debuting in 2021 as a collaboration with Source Music. I’m not sure if they’ll do it again for a couple of years, and although they could be scouting girls right now, I’m pretty sure they won’t be doing an audition any time soon due to the situation going on in the world, at least not an in-person audition.

To be honest, not any time soon or at least I think so because nothing has been mentioned. Any girl they had were sent over to another entertainment company and after what happened with GLAM, I think they are being cautious about the idea of bringing girls into the company again. Right now, they’re in thoughts of making another boy group therefore, I don’t see girls there any time soon.

Probably not, but I do expect they’ll do it eventually, just definitely not within 1–3 years. They’re trying to put together a new boyband to succeed BTS in international fame so that’s they’re main focus. And last time they had a girl group, a lot of scandals happened, so yeah, that’s BigHit
They wont. I believe they aren’t going to bring it back any time soon.
